We've got fabulous food - from burgers and wings to great vegetarian options.

A brewery with great food in North Charleston? With Axe Throwing!? Yup. Join us.

North Charleston Restaurant Menu & Beer List

Having a party?

Host your next event at the coolest brewery in Charleston!

We have great beer, approachable food with vegetarian options, outdoor patios, and axe throwing. What more could your party need? and let us know what you're looking for and we'll help you set it all up.
Reach out

[Page Title: Rusty Bull Brewing Co. | North Charleston, SC]

THE BEST RESTAURANT + BREWERY IN NORTH CHARLESTON.

Bring a friend and share a great local beer in a relaxed environment. Eat an amazing burger. Wander next door for some activities (including axe throwing) if you're so inclined. #notKidding
Restaurant Menu Beer List 
The North Charleston Restaurant + Production Brewery
3005 W. Montague Ave. 
Head up to our production brewery in North Charleston for a great beer!

Grab a cold beer and some great food seven days a week at our production brewery near Park Circle. Connected to Chucktown Axe Throwing!

The Main Event

Shuck & Shield Oyster Roast

Benefiting Defenders of Children & Sponsored by Tito's Handmade Vodka
All Events 
Featured Beer
Rusty Bull's 
Bearded Tiger
Amber Ale 
Our amber ale has great mouthfeel, refreshing balance of ginger and hop, and caramel notes to round this beer out nicely.
Beer List 
The Big Dish

The Uncle Doug

Tripple Decker Burger with Cheddar, Swiss, American cheeses. Complimented with Lettuce, Tomato, Pickle, and Rusty Bull Sauce. Give a thought to Uncle Doug as you enjoy this burger. Cheers!!
Full Menu 
Pair a great beer with some local music

Trivia + Great Events = Fun.

Want to do more than just drink beer? Join us for one of these great events!

North Charleston Events

Live music, trivia nights, craft beer and axe throwing! There's always something to do at our North Charleston taproom.

No further events this month. Check next month!

Beer. Trivia. Fun.

When you find yourself out in North Charleston near the airport or the PAC, you can always find a cold glass of Charleston-born beer nearby. And if you want to find something else to do ... you've come to the right place! Check out our calendar of events featuring beer releases, trivia nights, live music, the occasional comedian and yoga class!

© 2026 Rusty Bull Brewing Co. All rights reserved. .
